# Data preparatiom

## MAG functional annotations

These are the raw annotation table generated by DRAM, which are used to generate GIFT data using either distillR or KEGG.

```{r genome_annotations_hmsc, message=FALSE}
genome_gifts_hmsc <- read_tsv("data/distillr.tsv") 
```

## Wrap working objects

All working objects are wrapped into a single Rdata object to facilitate downstream usage.

```{r wrap_working_objects_hmsc, warning=FALSE, comments="", message=FALSE}
save(sample_metadata, 
     genome_metadata, 
     read_counts, 
     genome_counts, 
     genome_counts_filt, 
     genome_tree,
    genome_gifts_hmsc, 
     phylum_colors,
     file = "data/data_hmsc.Rdata")
```
